  • Class
    Description
    ClientBaseComponent
    Client side component containing the info about its id and rotation.
    ClientBatteryComponentDecorator
    Client side component decorator containing info about its battery contents.
    ClientBrokenVerifyComponentDecorator
    Client side component decorator marking it as broken or invalid.
    ClientCabinComponentDecorator
    Client side component decorator containing info about the crew inside it.
    ClientCannonComponentDecorator
    Client side component decorator containing info about its cannon's power and direction.
    ClientComponent
    Interface representing a client side BaseComponent , that can display its info.
    ClientComponentVisitor
    Visitor interface that allows any implementer to distinguish between the various subclasses of ClientComponent.
    ClientEmptyComponent
    Empty client side component.
    ClientEngineComponentDecorator
    Client side component decorator containing info about its engine's power and direction.
    ClientLifeSupportComponentDecorator
    Client side component decorator containing info about the alien type it can support.
    ClientPoweredComponentDecorator
    Client side component decorator containing information about its powered state.
    ClientShieldComponentDecorator
    Client side component decorator containing info about the directions it is shielding.
    ClientShipmentsComponentDecorator
    Client side component decorator containing info about the cargo it contains.
    ClientSpaceShip
    Client side representation of a spaceship and its stats.
